about_the_game:
Destructivator 2 Demo

Destructivator 2 is an all action platform shooter. The demo will give you a taste of what's on offer in the final game.

The final release will have more than 50 levels and difficulty levels. Be warned, this demo represents the max difficulty level that will come with the final game!

Set across 6 worlds, you'll:

  • Take on legions of enemy foot-soldiers
  • Traverse crafty traps
  • Blow stuff up
  • Take on an army of robots
  • Die quite a lot
  • Take on monstrous bosses

name: Destructivator 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 530 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A platform shooter that brings 90's gaming smashing into your face from your PC. Take on a vast army of foot-soldiers, robots, turrets, bosses and loads more. Fight on foot, in a fighter or in a bomber. Take on bosses and ensure that the alien menace won't threaten Earth ever again!
